entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • https://github.com/dotnet/maui/discussions/29221 #29284
  • Html encoded less than character "<" does not display in a Label when followed by a character immediately after #29282
  • Shell SearchHandler.Unfocus() has no effect on iOS & Android #29277
    Backlog
  • Binding the `Title` of a `ShellContent` with a `StringFormat` causes the string format to be applied multiple times. #29275
    Backlog

Closed

  • Scroll jitter #19383
    Backlog
  • I8_Header_and_Footer - Missing footer after clicking 'Clear All Items' button. #29137
    .NET 9 SR7
  • SwipeView In a CollectionView Faults When Scrolled in .NET 8 RC 2 #18530
    Backlog
  • MAUI: default mail app in IOS is not open... #29262
  • [regression/7.0.92] DatePicker Initial Binding/Rendering Not Working #16664

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup Stage for Validating CarouselView2 #29283
  • Remove Compatibility.Layout as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #29281
    t/breaking 💥, area-layout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Shell] Changed TitleProperty From TwoWay to OneWay #29280
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [.Net 10] Shell.SetNavBarVisibilityAnimationEnabled property #29279
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android & iOS]Make SearchHandler's Focus() and Unfocus() work #29278
    community ✨
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 2/n #29276
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Scrolling Feature #29230
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Re-Enabled UI Test - Issue10222Test #29226
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixes footer position not updated on CV1 when clearing all items #29173
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix for Argument Exception raised when the GetStringSize method of ICanvas called with default font #29048
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update internal release pipeline to push nuget #29271

Updated

  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [net10.0] Update preview4 dotnet #29254
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Remove workarounds from `WinUI.targets` #29256
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator improvements - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, collectionview-cv2
  • [HybridWebView] Refactor and convert the HybridWebView.js file into a TypeScript file #27183
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] SpacingItemDecoration improvement #27093
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
